verses.verse: And <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of it, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it:

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> and <S%H2351>without,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to it <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to be set by the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>corners<s%> of it; even <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And he <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> by the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and one <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H4749>beaten<s%> out of one <S%H4749>piece<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he them, on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat;

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the <S%H7098>end<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> side, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the other <S%H7098>end<s%> on that side: out of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat <S%H6213>made<s%> he the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7099>ends<s%> thereof.

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> out their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high,<s%> and <S%H5526>covered<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5980>over<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat, with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another;<s%> even to the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat were the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof:
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> thereunto a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

Also he <S%H6213>made<s%> thereunto a <S%H4526>border<s%> of an <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about; and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H4526>border<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that were in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereof.
<S%H5980>Over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H4526>border<s%> were the <S%H2885>rings,<s%> the <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H7979>table,<s%> his <S%H7086>dishes,<s%> and his <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> and his <S%H4518>bowls,<s%> and his <S%H7184>covers<s%> to <S%H5258>cover<s%> <S%H2004>with,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> of <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he the <S%H4501>candlestick;<s%> his <S%H3409>shaft,<s%> and his <S%H7070>branch,<s%> his <S%H1375>bowls,<s%> his <S%H3730>knops,<s%> and his <S%H6525>flowers,<s%> were of the same:

And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H6654>sides<s%> thereof; <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the one <S%H6654>side<s%> thereof, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> thereof:

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made after the fashion of <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower;<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> throughout the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>
And in the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds,<s%> his <S%H3730>knops,<s%> and his <S%H6525>flowers:<s%>

And a <S%H3730>bud<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the same, and a <S%H3730>bud<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the same, and a <S%H3730>bud<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the same, according to the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of it.
Their <S%H3730>knops<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> were of the same: <S%H3605>all<s%> of it was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> his <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and his <S%H4457>snuffers,<s%> and his <S%H4289>firepans,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of it was a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it a <S%H520>cubit;<s%> it was <S%H7251>foursquare;<s%> and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it; the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof were of the same.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> both the <S%H1406>top<s%> of it, and the <S%H7023>sides<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it: also he <S%H6213>made<s%> to it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for it <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2213>crown<s%> thereof, by the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>corners<s%> of it, on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> thereof, to be <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it with.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> oil, and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices,<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary.<s%>
